text:
if you have nested xml

<echoxml xmlns:a>
 <a:something />
</echoxml>

namespace declarations are not passed down. Really we should include all
prefixes used inside the nested xml.
creator: stevel@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 20696
Patch for a proposed fix to the bug

This is my first patch for Ant, so I hope I did it right. This is the output
from "svn diff >> patchfile.txt" at the top level of the ant subversion tree.
creator: richeyje@cs.rose-hulman.edu
bodewig@apache.org
text:
modified version of the patch went in as svn revision 688091, thanks!

Namespace support for attributes doesn't seem to work properly, but then again I'm not sure I really understand how it should work.
